---
title: "Archivo para xlsx->csv"
---
  
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(readr)

# =========================
# Dataset de Divorcios
# =========================

divorcios_raw <- read_excel(
  path = "Datos/diccionario_divorcios_2022.xlsx",
  sheet = "Divorcios"
)

write_csv(
  divorcios_raw,
  "Datos/divorcios_2022.csv"
)
```


```{r}
# =========================
# Dataset de Violencia
# =========================

violencia_raw <- read_excel(

)

)

```
